description:
🔹I’ve been struggling with this little one. He is 4 years old (just turned 4 in May) and I’m not sure if it’s the age thing, the stress of a move on a child, or the fact that he has a new brother who requires much of our attention. Or maybe it’s all of the above!! But he’s been extra difficult to navigate these days. Has anyone else gone through something similar? I’ve decided to do what I can and LISTEN to him. To STOP and be with him. To PLAY with him. And maybe that’s why he is frustrated. We haven’t had the time for all of that lately... sometimes I forget life isn’t just hard for the adults. He misses his school and friends SOOO MUCH. He asks about school once or TWICE A DAY. My heart hurts for him... He’s only been on this earth 4 years and it feels like a whole year is just being taken from him. Anyways, I love you so much, Nolan. ❤️ You’re my baby boy and you always will be. I love being your mommy. 

(Swipe for the reality of what it’s like getting a pic with a 4 year old HAHA)
